Cards.Heading: how it works
Cards.body-1: Use your phone to take a clear, well lit photo of your product. Natural light near a window works best no fancy camera needed
Cards.body-2: Upload the photo straight to our site. No editing, no setup  just a simple upload, and you're good to go. our AI will handle the rest from here.
Cards.body-3: Shaheen generates a polished background with engaging captions , You can edit it before publishing, so you have full control over the final look

FinalCta.title: You Could've Posted by Now Let's Go
FinalCta.subtitle: Let our AI do the writing while you focus on growing your brand

Faq.Heading: Frequently Asked Questions
Faq.A-1: Just sign up for a new account, then upload a photo of your product. Our AI will handle the rest.
Faq.A-2: No, our platform is designed to be easy to use even if you have no prior experience.
Faq.Q-3: How can I edit the content ?
Faq.A-3: After the content is ready, you can edit it before publishing. You have full control.
Faq.Q-4: Can I use it on mobile ?
Faq.A-4: Yes, our platform is mobile-friendly. You can upload photos and edit content from anywhere.
Faq.A-5: Yes, we have a support team ready to help you anytime. You can contact us through the website or by email.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Shaheen AI ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered social media management platform.

personalInfo.title: 2.1 Personal Information
items: Name and email address when you create an account
Profile information and preferences
Social media account credentials (when connecting platforms)
Payment information for premium services

usageInfo.title: 2.2 Usage Information
items: Content you upload, generate, or edit using our AI tools
Posts you schedule or publish through our platform
Analytics and performance data
Device information and usage patterns

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.intro: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide and maintain our AI-powered services
Generate and enhance content using artificial intelligence
Schedule and publish posts to your connected social media accounts
Process payments and manage subscriptions
Improve our services and develop new features
Send important updates and notifications
Provide customer support and respond to inquiries

aiProcessing.title: 4. AI and Content Processing
aiProcessing.intro: Our platform uses artificial intelligence to:
items: Generate and enhance images and content
Analyze your social media performance
Provide personalized recommendations
Optimize posting schedules
aiProcessing.additional: Content you upload or generate may be processed by our AI systems to improve our services. We ensure that all AI processing is conducted securely and in accordance with this privacy policy.

informationSharing.title: 5. Information Sharing
informationSharing.intro: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
items: With your explicit consent
To comply with legal obligations
To protect our rights and prevent fraud
With trusted service providers who assist in operating our platform
With social media platforms when you authorize connections

dataSecurity.title: 6. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information, including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights
items: Access and review your personal information
Update or correct your information
Delete your account and associated data
Opt-out of marketing communications
Request data portability
Withdraw consent for data processing

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and provide personalized content. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

thirdParty.title: 9. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Our platform integrates with third-party services such as social media platforms and payment processors. These services have their own privacy policies, and we encourage you to review them.

childrenPrivacy.title: 10. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected such information, please contact us immediately.

internationalTransfers.title: 11. International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure that such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and implement appropriate safeguards.

changes.title: 12. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our website and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 13. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
